articles.title: Biden says Fed targeting inflation, China tariffs under review - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden, under pressure to tame high inflation, told Americans on Tuesday that he understands their plight and that he and the U.S. Federal Reserve are working to solve what he called his administration's top domestic priority.
